BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Async repo contents iterator (#120819) Reifies the iterator over each repository's contents so that we can (in follow-ups, and under certain combinations of request options) pre-process this iterator to avoid loading `SnapshotInfo` blobs that we can determine to be unnecessary up front. This is just a refactoring, it doesn't change behaviour, and this area is well-covered by tests such as `GetSnapshotsIT#testAllFeatures` so no need for any test changes here.
